ESA will be sponsoring a Share the Gift of Life and Love Blood Drive on February 14th from 9:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. The Blood Connection, a non-profit blood bank, will have a mobile collection unit on-site in the visitor's parking lot for eligible volunteers to make a donation. This is a unique fundraising drive as well. For each volunteer that is able to make a blood contribution, the school will receive a $20 donation from the Blood Connection. The money that we receive will be used to help increase the available funds we use to send teachers to Professional Development classes and training where they learn skills that improve the quality of education for our students. Our goal is to get a minimum of 27 donors but we would love to get even more than that. Remember that each blood donation has the potential to save up to 3 lives. This is not open to the public so only eligible ESA adults are accepted.

Please consider being a donor. The link to sign up is
https://donate.thebloodconnection.org/donor/schedules/drive_schedule/141008
